::Liono::
Liono slow folds his arms across his chest. Liono looks at Ramiel "What kind 
of arrangement?" Liono looks at the creatures as slow raises two fingers on 
his right hand. Liono gentle drums them on his left arm. As the low level 
scanner in his bracers activates he scans Ramiel and Gogolan. ((They are 
your characters give me some their data about them.))
